title: How long is account transferring supposed to take?
body:
Hello, I bought an account transfer for my EUW account(not this one) like 8-9 hours ago and it still didn't transfer.

Is it supposed to take that long? I did make a support ticket and still waiting for the answer but I made this post to see if other players that did it also needed a long time since it says that it's almost instant.

replies.body: Made a transfer from NA to EUW on my other acc and it is not instant as well. Says on NA that it was transferred but it is not found on EUW... oh well...

It should be quick, but there might be delays sometimes especially if there's patches or [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) issues.  If you have a ticket number, I'd be happy to check on the status for you!

Great now I will probably have to wait like 2 days for riot's support to respond and try to fix this just because their shit isn't working right. 

Unlucky
